demo.main

Interface Profiles


  • public interface Profiles
    Spring Bean configuration profiles used in this application. Three profile combinations are currently in use:
    • CONTROLLER_PROFILE - creates a controller that also does its own exception handling - see ExceptionHandlingController.
    • GLOBAL_PROFILE and JAVA_CONFIG_PROFILE - creates a controller with no exception handlers. Instead exceptions are handled globally - see ControllerWithoutExceptionHandlers and GlobalExceptionHandlingControllerAdvice. A SimpleMappingExceptionResolver is also created using Java Config - see ExceptionConfiguration.
    • GLOBAL_PROFILE and XML_CONFIG_PROFILE - as previous but the SimpleMappingExceptionResolver is configured using XML - see mvc-configuration.xml
    The ability to switch between Java or XML configuration for the SimpleMappingExceptionResolver is just for demonstration purposes. In a real application use one or the other, but not both. You are very likely to have an existing XML definition for this bean, if you have an existing application, and there is no need to change it.
    Author:
    Paul Chapman
